testcase.title: More results are fetched with dollar sign ($) than with asterisk(*)

substeps.message: I select collection on page BasicSearchPage

steps.title: I select collection "Web of Science Core Collection"
I select search "Advanced Search"

substeps.message: Text of textInput Search Term is .
Text of textInput Search Term is TS=(congenital diaphragmatic hernia*).
textInput Search Term  'TS=(congenital diaphragmatic hernia*)' text was entered.
Search finished with no error message

steps.title: I perform search by query "TS=(congenital diaphragmatic hernia*)" on page "Advanced Search"

substeps.message: Text of textInput Search Term is .
Text of textInput Search Term is TS= (congenital diaphragmatic hernia$).
textInput Search Term  'TS= (congenital diaphragmatic hernia$)' text was entered.
Search finished with no error message

steps.title: I perform search by query "TS= (congenital diaphragmatic hernia$)" on page "Advanced Search"

substeps.message: The query with asterix TS=(congenital diaphragmatic hernia*) has more records than query with dollar TS= (congenital diaphragmatic hernia$)

steps.title: I verify that result count for "TS= (congenital diaphragmatic hernia$)" is lesser than "TS=(congenital diaphragmatic hernia*)"
